.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed

summary.para: Returns a object that contains the security information of the current instance.

para.block: Returns an instance of the permission type that corresponds to the current attribute. The returned object contains the security information of the current attribute.

Override this method to create an instance of the permission type that corresponds to the current attribute. For example, the implementation of creates an instance of the
class.

block.para: Security information specified using attributes is stored in metadata. The security information in the metadata is created using the permission object returned by this method.
